unidue.ub.statistics

Class ItemEventCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • unidue.ub.statistics.ItemEventCollector

  • public class ItemEventCollector
extends java.lang.Object
    Collects documents, items and events connected to build the corresponding documents.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Frank Lützenkirchen, Eike Spielberg

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemEventCollector

        public ItemEventCollector(AlephConnection connection,
                          java.lang.String shelfmark,
                          boolean exact,
                          ItemFilter filter,
                          java.lang.String mode)
        Builds a new instance of a ItemEventCollector-object.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the Aleph database
        shelfmark - the shelfmark of the document
        exact - boolean, indicating whether a propagation to other editions is wanted
        filter - limits the collection and material of the items added to the document
        mode - allowing to retrieve docuemnts by shelfmark or budget

      • ItemEventCollector

        public ItemEventCollector(AlephConnection connection,
                          boolean exact,
                          ItemFilter filter)
        Builds a new instance of a ItemEventCollector-object.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the Aleph database
        exact - boolean, indicating whether a propagation to other editions is wanted
        filter - limits the collection and material of the items added to the document

                   Manifestation document)
            throws java.lang.Exception,
                   java.sql.SQLException,
                   java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        adds the bibliographics description to the document.
        Parameters:
        mabGetter - a MABGetter-object to retrieve the bibliographic information in MAB-format from the Aleph database.
        document - existing document, to which the bibliographic information are added
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - general exception
        java.sql.SQLException - exception in connecting to Aleph database
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - exception reading MAB data

                     Manifestation document)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        adds the items to the document.
